comments.body: shouldn’t do any harm but we don’t test telemetry in the integration tests so this is not testing the code path we care about.
yes, it's meant to detect future dependency on a writable .daml directory.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +45,49 @@                        ["install", "--install-assistant=yes", "--set-path=no", extractDir]
                    else callCommandSilent $ extractDir </> "install.sh"
                -- We restrict the permissions of the DAML_HOME directory to make sure everything
                -- still works when the directory is read-only.
                allFiles <- listFilesRecursive targetDir
